name: Robo Runner
description:
GAME

Robo Runner is an Infinite Runner game for Andorid devices. It's my first game made Unity, so feel free to download and give me some feedbacks.

Thanks and have fun :D

GAMEPLAY
  • Tap left screen to crunch.
  • Tap right screen to jump, tap twice to double jump.
AUDIO

"Hyperfun" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Link: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.ht...

Jump Sound: http://soundbible.com/1601-Mario-Jumping.html

Game desing was downloaded at: http://opengameart.org/
